  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.io.DhcpRequestContext

public class DhcpRequestContext
extends Object

      • getInterfaceAddress

        @Nonnull
public InterfaceAddress getInterfaceAddress()
        Returns the single InterfaceAddress on which this request will be transmitted. You may have to call setClientAddress(java.net.InetAddress) before this is valid.
